description:
Work to various trees in the Hanwell Village Green CA
 T3 Ash - remove major deadwood, lift low crown over car park parking bays to approx. 3m
 T4 Jacqemont's Birch -  lift low crown over car park parking bays to approx. 3m
 T5 Silver Birch - prune to clear building by approx. 2m, lift low crown over car park parking bays to approx. 3m
 T6 Elm - fell to ground level
 T7 Oak - Retrenchment prune by approx. 30% 
 T9 Elm - fell to ground level
 T11 Elm x 7 - fell to ground level
 T12 Ash - crown reduce by 30% overall, remove remaining major deadwood 
 T18 Oak - fell to a safe height of approx. 5m
 T22 Alder - fell to ground level
 T23 Ash - fell to a height of 4m (crown break)
 T24 Oak - reduce 2 x scaffold branches above and below tree tag by approx. 30%
 T26 Alder - fell to ground level
 T28 Elm x 2 - fell to ground level
 T30 Sycamore - fell to ground level
 T31 Elm - fell to ground level
 TG2 Yew x 2 and 1 x Sycamore - lift low crown to approx. 3m and remove basal growth
 TG8 Lime x 9 - remove basal growth
 TG17 - Elm x 9 - fell each stem to ground level
 TG21 White Poplar x 2 - remove faulted branches ( 1 small hanging branch and larger scaffold branch)
 TG27 Coppice stool - coppice all marked stems
 TG29 - Maple x 2 - fell to ground level
